data.actual_result: The cursor will always snap to the last word in a text string.
data.expected_result: You can scroll smoothly through text to any point you want
data.short_description: Scrolling through the new text box causes the cursor to snap to the end of a text string, and in general scrolling the chat box is not smooth.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type out enough text to have a few lines in the text box, a good size paragraph will do - try to scroll through the text. - notice the cursor snaps the last word in a sentence (I mean the last word on that particular line of text)
